text: Kaveri Priyam (born 22 October 1994, Bokaro) is an Indian actress. She is known for her portraying Kuhu Maheshwari Rajvansh in Yeh Rishtey Hain Pyaar Ke and Dr. Monami Mahajan in Ziddi Dil Maane Na. == Early life == Kaveri Priyam was born on October 22 1994 in Bokaro, Jharkhand. She did her schooling from Bokaro's St. Xavier School and graduated from Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore. After completing her studies, she moved to Mumbai and started her career as a model with advertisements. She has a younger brother, Ritesh with whom she owns a restaurant Konkan Chilly in Mumbai. == Filmography == === Television === Year Title Role Ref. 2017 Naagin 2 Madhu Makkhi Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil Savdhaan India 2019-2020 Yeh Rishtey Hain Pyaar Ke Kuhu Maheshwari Rajvansh 2019 Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai 2021 Shakti - Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki Dr. Isha 2021-2022 Ziddi Dil Maane Na Dr. Monami "Monu/Mo" Mahajan 2022 Maddam Sir Wagle Ki Duniya â€“ Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey 2022-present Dil Diyaan Gallaan Amrita === Films === Year Title Role Ref. 2018 Tishnagi Divya == References == == Other websites == * Kaveri Priyam on Bollywood Hungama * Category:Living people Category:Indian television actors Category:1994 births
